title: Whale Sharks: Giant Fish
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 255 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 470L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     R and X
description: In Whale Sharks: Giant Fish, students will learn about what makes these gentle giants so special, including what they look like, where they live, and how they grow. Colorful pictures support the text.
